Pre-Game Insights: Wizards have 13 wins in 32 games against the spread this season.
The Wizards are 13-19 as 3.5-point underdogs or greater.
The Pelicans have been favorites in eight games this season and won three (37.5%) of those contests.
This season, Washington has come away with a win five times in 31 chances when named as an underdog of at least +145 or longer on the moneyline.
The Pelicans have a 63.6% chance to win this game based on the implied probability of the moneyline.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New Orleans Pelicans (6-29) are 3.5-point favorites as they look to stop a 15-game road losing streak when they take on the Washington Wizards (6-26) on Sunday, January 5, 2025 at Capital One Arena.
The contest airs at 6:00 PM ET on MNMT and Gulf Coast Sports.
The Pelicans and their opponents have gone over 235.5 combined points in 11 of 35 games this season.
The average point total in New Orleans’ matchups this year is 223.4, 12.1 fewer points than this game’s over/under.
The Wizards have played 13 games this season that have had more than 235.5 combined points scored.
The average over/under for Washington’s outings this season is 231.7, 3.8 fewer points than this game’s point total.
The Wizards are the league’s 29th-highest scoring team this season compared to the 19th-ranked Pelicans.
The Pelicans are the league’s 27th-ranked scoring defense while the Wizards are the 20th-ranked.
